listQuestions.question: What is the application workload type?
What is the architecture type of application under consideration?
Have you performed assessment of the application for its cloud readiness?
What is the type of data is the application expected to handle?
How is the application going to be accessed?
Is the application expected to handle large amounts of data?
When is the peak load expected for the application?
Does the application have a near zero RTO/RPO requirement?
Does the application need to transfer data over a content delivery network (CDN)?
Does the application require to maintain audit and transaction logs for a specified time interval as per regulatory requirements?
Does the application need to be accessed through Multi-factor Authentication?
Does the application mandate the data residing within the application to be hosted in a particualr geography only?
Are you certain that the application will be in production one year from Yesw?
Does the application need large amounts of compute and performance?
Does managing the application need niche skills and high level of expertise?
Does the application need high levels of customization to meet business objectives?
Does the application need integration with on-prem applications / workloads?
